modName: Skill Interface Retexture 6 BCF and BAIN Wizard
summary: Its just a BCF file including BAIN wizard file for Skill Interface retexture 6.0.
descriptionHtml:
Skill Interface Retexture is an amazing mod.
But I found it cannot be installed correctly through bain.So I modified a wizard.txt file base on the nmm package.

You can find Skill Interface Retexture mod here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7308/?

how to use:
1.copy the file to \"\\Bash Installers\\Bain Converters\"
2.open wrye bash.
3.right-click on original SRI6 package in \"installers\" tab,choose \"conversions\" -> \"Apply\" -> this file,then type a new filename in the input box.
author: tommyonsn
